item.title: Latex: Put Year in Parenthesis for Citing
item.description: To put year in parenthesis when citing in LaTex using APA format, for exmaple, According to Goodguy (1990), blablabla..., we can use this: \newcommand{\citeauthorandyear}[2][]{ \citeauthor{#2} (\citeyear[#1]{#2}) } This solution is by Felix K. .
